title: Kenya Has a Perilous Plastic Pollution Problem
text: The world has a plastic pollution problem. That is the big picture. It has countries looking for creative solutions. Environmentalists say there's no more time for talk. As VOA’s Arash Arabasadi reports, they say it's time for action
